Author: xStingx
Text: I just sucked it up and moved on. We weren't necessarily together but we loved each other and it felt just like a breakup when he left. It hurt like hell but what can you do really? If you have to cry, just cry. Get it all out and let time heal you.

Author: HoldenCaulfield7
Text: Just focus on you and spend time with friends and family. Working out was wonderful for me because it let me release and run out my anger. I was more angry than sad at a point. Youâ€™ll get through this and know that every relationship teaches you and prepares you for your next one. You learn and grow with each person you are with.
